title: Patrick.O'Brian--Aubrey-Maturin.series--1st.10.books--m4b.audio
description:
"... the best historical novels ever written. On every page Mr. O&#039;Brian reminds us with subtle artistry of the most important of all historical lessons: that times change but people don&#039;t, that the griefs and follies and victories of the men and women who were here before us are in fact the maps of our own lives."
New York Times Book Review, January 6, 1991


This torrent contains audiobook versions of the first 10 novels in Patrick O&#039;Brian&#039;s 20-novel "Aubreyad," following the friendship and seafaring adventures of Captain Jack Aubrey of the Royal Navy and his ship&#039;s surgeon Stephen Maturin, a physician, natural philosopher and secret agent, during the Napoleonic wars.

For the most part these are the authoritative Recorded Books versions, performed by Patrick Tull. All are unabridged, and include the Geoff Hunt cover art. The files are in ipod m4b audiobook format, encoded at 64kbps. The torrent includes the following books:

Master and Commander (1970)
Post Captain (1972)
HMS Surprise (1973)
The Mauritius Command (1977)
Desolation Island (1978)
The Fortune of War (1979)
The Surgeon&#039;s Mate (1980)
The Ionian Mission (1981)
Treason&#039;s Harbour (1983)
The Far Side of the World (1984)
